## IFileSystemDeleteFileOptions.throwIfNotExists property

If true, will throw an exception if the file did not exist before `deleteFile()` was called. Defaults to `false`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
throwIfNotExists?: boolean;
```
